Corporate Trustee

Business orientated professional

A business orientated Corporate Trustee

“We combine our fiduciary duties and powers with the critical need to run the scheme as an efficient business”



Confident in operating on a project basis

"Being your alter-ego during a major transition period and participating in your effort to find a “win-win” solution for the scheme strategy"



Full compliance is central to our business judgment

“We combine our pension knowledge, business judgment and understanding of your rules to deliver an excellent outcome for you and the members”



Team

Gilles Erulin

  • Over 20 years experience in the finance and investment markets
  • Has sat on multiple companies board both as executive and NED
  • Global Head of Insurance for Artemis from 2000 to 2007 and previously Headed Financiere Pinault – Artemis Mergers & Acquisitions Group and then its Insurance investments in life and non life cie’s
  • Managed the take-over of Christie’s (UK auction firm) which involved raising £780m financing
  • Supervised the Christie’s DB scheme restructuring

Matthew Gribbin

  • UK plc Board Executive Director
  • 20 years experience in acquisitions/mergers/disposals, senior commercial experience
  • Current non Exec Chairman
  • Member Nominated Pension Trustee.
  • Knowledge and experience in investments, operational management and  governance
  • Assets under control £850m. DB and DC schemes
  • Experience in managing change in scheme sponsor, outsourcing administration activities

Gilles Oudis

  • 30 years of investment banking experience in capital markets, corporate finance and asset management
  • Senior Banker at Societe Generale Corporate and Investment Banking
  • Involved in numerous M&A and corporate finance deals advising corporates, financial institutions and governments
  • Advised the French Government for the privatization of EDF and the restructuring of its 60bn€ pension liabilities
  • Advised French Pension institutions on the management of their assets

Andrew Wadley

  • Main Board commercial experience
  • Experienced Trustee with in depth knowledge of complex investment structures, governance and operational management
  • Total assets under control in excess of £3.5 billion - schemes from sub £10m to £1bn
  • Successfully managed significant scheme transitions - acquisition of a sponsoring employer, closure to future accrual, scheme buy-in, buy-out and mergers, benchmarking advisers
